name: senecio
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a plant of the daisy family that has groups of small, usually yellow flowers. There are many different types of senecio, including ragworts and a number of succulents (= plants whose leaves can store water): The yellow flowers of the senecio should be nipped out to encourage more growth.
More examplesFewer examplesThe name fleawort is applied to certain species of the genus Senecio. Senecios are succulent houseplants that require minimum care. The silver-leaved Senecio cineraria and miniature purple violas complement each other perfectly in a pot.
